# The min Function

## Brief Description
The min function returns the minimum element from a given set or input. This is typically an array or vector. The min function scans through the set of values and finds the smallest number.

## What Package Contains It
The min function is contained in the base R package.

## When to Use It
The min function should be used when it is necessary to find the minimum element in a given set of data.
